title: [1.2.5]更多的地形mod 多图杀猫慎入
author: king77326
txt_content:
本帖最后由 king77326 于 2012-6-11 20:37 编辑 

此mod新增22種地形，非常適合看原版看到快吐的人使用。地形

Alps--光禿山
 
Autumn Woods--秋天樹種區

Birch Forest--白樺林
有些凹凸的地形和樹，所有樹都是白樺樹

Extreme Jungle--叢林山脈
 
Forested Hills--森林山脈
或許原版可以看到，不過樹更茂密

Forested Island-- 森林群島
一群小島嶼，似乎很難找到動物

Glacier--冰川
冰塊+雪塊+石頭+泥土-樹 

Green Hills-- 綠地丘陵
有漂亮的風景，白色、紫色的花，少量的樹

Green Swamp--綠色沼澤
較高的樹、繡球花和香蒲，沒有沼澤的黑綠

Ice Wasteland--冰山

Marsh--沼澤
 
Meadow--草原
接近飛機場平，有很多花

Mini Jungle--迷你叢林


Mountain Desert--沙漠山區
作者評語：無聊又醜陋！

Mountain Ridge--山脊(紅土山)
非常崎嶇的山地，紅土可拿來裝飾

Mountain Taiga--山脈
 
Pine Forest--松樹林
 
Rainforest--雨林峭壁
有蕨類，山脈和綠色樹林 

Redwood Forest--懸崖松樹
 
Redwood Lush--松樹山脈
 
Savanna--稀樹草原
棕色平原，有黃色、紫色的花，和一些相思樹，別有一番風味  
Shrubland--灌木叢 (比較像小丘陵)

Snow Forest--雪森林
 
Temperate Rainforest--松樹雨林
 
Temperate Rainforest Snow--松樹雨林+雪 
 
Tundra--苔原
 
Wasteland--荒地
 
Woodlands--林地
  
  

资源:115网盘附件下载:ExtraBiomesXL-V1.16.zip (418.86KB)

replies.author: hukk
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 hukk 于 2012-4-20 17:07 编辑 

其实还有的：
Arctic - A frozen landscape with sparse cedar trees and shrubs




Bayou - Tall, vine-covered trees loom over a swampy area with murky water and logs sticking up from the ground.



Bog - The new bog biome (Old bog biome renamed to Quagmire) is a murky, swampy land with slimy-yellow trees and grass, murky water, and mud bordering the shores.



Cherry Blossom Grove - Pink and white cherry blossom trees cover a lush landscape of white/tiny flowers and sprouts.



Crag - Insane mountains and drops made of "dirt rock" as I like to call it.



Crystal Caverns - These aren't actually separate biomes, but rather, crystals (Which are translucent and give off light) will generate underground in certain biomes (Not saying which, as that'll ruin the fun).



Dark Forest - A spooky, dark forest with dark skies and tall trees.



Deadlands - Black skies are cast over this obsidian covered hell on earth where mobs can spawn during the day, and the water is as red as blood.



Deciduous Forest - A relatively flat forest with tall cedar trees, large oak trees, and bushes spread along the ground.



Dune - A sandy, yet lush desert with Dune Grass and Desert Sprouts covering the area.



Flower Field - A flat, lush, green field covered in tons of flowers.



Gravel Beach - A relatively flat area composed of nothing but gravel. Great for gathering gravel for building paths, or if you need to make a lot of arrows.



Grove - Very lush forest with redwood and ivy trees, with ivy growing on the side of blocks (Like how vines grow in jungles), lots of tiny flowers, hydrangeas, and reeds. Cat tails and lily pads also appear in this biome.



Lush Desert - A rocky, red paradise littered with bushes, shrubs, sprouts, oases, and water springs.



Mangrove - A forest-like beach with cypress knees and dead shrubs sticking out of the sand.



Maple Forest - A peaceful, colorful forest of red, orange, and brown trees, with sparse cedar trees. Fallen leaves cover the landscape.



Mountain - Huge mountains with flat summits covered in cedar and pine trees



Mystic Forest - A mysterious, magical forest filled with plants, purple water, and the occasional giant mushroom.



Oasis - A deserted land with a few palm trees here and there, and oases around every pond.



Orchard - A very cheerful biome with vibrant colors, as well as apple trees! Fruitful apple trees aren't as common as fruitless ones, but they're still common enough that it won't be hard to find one.



Origin Forest - Miss the vibrant colors and simplistic generation of Alpha? This biome will be perfect for you...



Pasture - A dry, open land with lots of wheat grass, cows, and large trees.



Prairie - Flat grassland with nothing but thick grass and wheat grass.



Quagmire - Dead trees over a muddy landscape, with brown, murky water.



Sandstone Plateau - Basically just a completely barren desert made of sandstone.



Seasonal Forest - A relatively dead forest with deciduous trees, some with leaves, some without. Leaf piles cover the ground.



Scrubland - Sort of like a desert forest, with small bushes, patches of sand, and dead shrubs.



Steppe - A hilly land with high grass covering the majority of the area.



Temperate Jungle - A less dense and flatter version of the jungle, with the same biome coloring as forests. No shrubs along the ground make for easier navigation.



Tropical Rainforest - Broadleaf trees cover a lush, green land where melons have a chance of spawning.



Tropics - A mob-free paradise with clear skies, tall palm trees, and lush hills of tall grass and orange flowers. Only found in the form of islands.



Wetlands - A swampy forest with dark blue water and slimy green grass.



Wheat Field - Rolling hills of grain provide magnificent scenery here. The field wheat has a 1/20 chance of dropping wheat when broken.



Volcanic Island - A rock covered island with lava flows coming out of the side.






There are 3 new crafting recipes with the add-on though, which are as follows:

Spring Spirit (Item that allows you to jump higher for 30 seconds when eaten):
CWC
HOH
CTC
C = Cattail, W = White Flower, H = Hydrangea, O = Orange Flower, T = Toadstool
Leaf Pile
XXX
LLL
LLL
X = Blank, L = Leaf block
Maple Leaf Pile
XXX
ROR
RBR
R = Red Leaf Block, O = Orange Leaf Block, B = Brown Leaf Block

某某人说别用机翻，所以直接把英文复制了一遍，省的别人扣分
